comments:
I20070227-0800

Several errors in .log after searching help for 'access restriction' when launching Eclipse with Swiss German locale:

user.country=CH
user.language=de
osgi.nl=de_CH

Related to fix for bug 68736?

Looks like we forgot the dependency from the analyzers to lucene.
*** Bug 176242 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
FYI, I think the fix for this wasn't quite right, due to multiple versions of lucene in the build features. I've opened a new bug to track, see bug 176459.
*** Bug 177485 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

DJ, this fix hasn't yet propagated to the SDK because the orbit map file still
points to an old january build of lucene analysis. Could you release? (or is
that my job?)

Orbit will be promoting an integration build to a new stable build this week and at that time we can point the SDK to the new lucene.

I have entered bug 177569 to remind us.

traces.message: Plug-in org.eclipse.help.base was unable to load class org.apache.lucene.analysis.de.GermanAnalyzer.
